settings.name: host
settings.title: Backend Host
settings.description: Hostname/IP of the Interview Automator backend

settings.name: port
settings.title: Backend Port
settings.description: Port of the Interview Automator backend

settings.name: topic
settings.value: You have given part of interview session. Interview were held for middle java software developer position. Interview was in Russian. Prepare Yourself to answer job interview questions.
settings.title: Conversation Topic
settings.description: First message to ChatGPT that defines topic of the whole conversation

settings.name: debug_enabled
settings.title: Debug enabled
settings.description: If enabled, some debug related features will be visible

settings.name: transcription
settings.title: Transcription
settings.description: Transcription of voice message sent to backend

settings.name: init_file_path
settings.title: Initialization file path
settings.description: Path to file with initialization data in the device's local filesystem

settings.name: voice_file_path
settings.title: Voice message file path
settings.description: Path to which store file with voice recording, can be default App path

settings.name: backend_timeout
settings.title: Timeout to Backend
settings.description: Connect timeout (seconds) to Interview Automator backend

settings.name: prompt_extract
settings.value: Extract all the questions asked by interviewer.
settings.title: Prompt - Extract questions
settings.description: Prompt for additional action of extracting questions asked by interviewer from transcription

settings.name: prompt_theory_intro
settings.value: You have given part of interview session. Interview was in Russian. Interview were held for middle Java software developer position.
settings.title: Prompt - Theory intro
settings.description: Part of the prompt that placed before question for Theory stage

settings.name: prompt_theory_outro
settings.value: Generate JSON containing questions by interviewer and answers by candidate. Your answer should contain generated JSON only, nothing else. JSON structure should be following: { "interview_session": [ "question": "", "answer": "", ... ] }
settings.title: Prompt - Theory outro
settings.description: Part of the prompt that placed after question for Theory stage

settings.name: prompt_livecoding_intro
settings.value: You have given part of interview session. Interview was in Russian. Given session is livecoding. Livecoding session was held for middle Java software developer position.
settings.title: Prompt - Livecoding intro
settings.description: Part of the prompt that placed before question for Livecoding stage

settings.name: prompt_livecoding_outro
settings.value: Generate JSON containing problem explanation by interviewer and code generated by you. Your answer should contain generated JSON only, nothing else. JSON structure should be following: \n{ "interview_session": [ "question": "", "answer": "", ... ] } \nProblem explanation should be in "question" field. Code generated should be in "answer" field.
settings.title: Prompt - Livecoding outro
settings.description: Part of the prompt that placed after question for Livecoding stage

settings.name: prompt_softskills_intro
settings.value: You have given part of interview session. Interview was in Russian. The interviewer, an employee of the HR department, asks questions on softskills.
settings.title: Prompt - Softskills intro
settings.description: Part of the prompt that placed before question for Softskills stage

settings.name: prompt_softskills_outro
settings.value: Generate JSON containing questions by interviewer and answers by candidate. Your answer should contain generated JSON only, nothing else. JSON structure should be following: { "interview_session": [ "question": "", "answer": "", ... ] }
settings.title: Prompt - Softskills outro
settings.description: Part of the prompt that placed after question for Softskills stage

settings.name: openai_timeout
settings.title: Timeout to OpenAI
settings.description: Connect timeout (seconds) from IA Backend to OpenAI API
